details: 1st of Deepwinter, Year 2026. The simulation awakens in an era known as the Standard.
Guild banners snapped in the breeze while decent folk lay sleeping.

Ancient wards fail. What they imprisoned walks again.

summary: The Grim Wolves skirt around wary patrol guards
details: As even the taverns fell silent an abandoned cart with broken axles. The road stretches grey beneath grey skies. A handful of territorial patrol guards, watching warily. Sometimes wisdom is knowing when to flee. Merchant stalls lined along the roadside marked the scene.
